tool.name: Nmds
tool.command:
echo 'nmds( phylip=$dist #if $axes: ,axes=$axes #end if ,mindim=$mindim #if $maxdim >= $mindim: ,maxdim=$maxdim #end if ,iters=$iters ,maxiters=$maxiters
## Mothur can't cope with scientific notation #set epsilon_decimal = "{:.12f}".format(float($epsilon)) ,epsilon=$epsilon_decimal )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$dist" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.axes "$nmds_axes" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.iters "$nmds_iters" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.stress "$nmds_stress"

param.name: iters
param.label: iters - Number of random configuration to try (default 10)

param.name: maxiters
param.label: maxiters - Number of iterations to try with each random configuration (default 500)

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
.. _Mothur: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Main_Page
**Command Documenation**
The nmds_ command generates non-metric multidimensional scaling data from a phylip_distance_matrix_.
.. _phylip_distance_matrix: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Phylip-formatted_distance_matrix .. _nmds: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Nmds
